channel.title: Danny Shittu on
channel.description: Recent content in Danny Shittu on

item.title: Danny Shittu, Danny Simpson, Matthew Kilgallon & Jemaine Beckford all Toon bound?
item.description: Sky Sports are reporting that Bolton’s Danny Shittu could well arrive on Tyneside on a loan deal until the end of the season. The Nigerian hasn’t really had much of a look in at the Reebok and with the arrival of Owen Coyle, Newcastle are hopeful they can borrow the 6’2 centre half. Just in case you don’t know too much about him, he’s 29 years of age, a Nigerian international and has played for a fair few clubs in his time.
